price: 24. Kimia ezala o kati na bino тропа maye bozalaki kokanga mitema mpe koyika mpiko. Mpe oyo nde suka y a efandelo y a malamu!
arabic: سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُم بِمَا صَبَرۡتُمۡۚ فَنِعۡمَ عُقۡبَى ٱلدَّارِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: salāmun ʿalaykum bimā ṣabartum faniʿ'ma ʿuq'bā al-dāri
